description_application: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization without a signed-in user. Includes display name, first and last name, email address, open extensions, and photo.
description_delegated: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user. This includes display name, first and last name, email address and photo.

display_delegated: Read and write access to user profile
description_delegated: Allows the app to read your profile. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.

display_application: Read and write all users' full profiles
display_delegated: Read and write all users' full profiles
description_application: Allows the app to read and update user profiles without a signed in user.
description_delegated: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.

display_application: Read and write profiles of users that originate from an external cloud.
description_application: Allows the app to read and update external cloud user profiles without a signed in user.

display_application: Revoke all sign in sessions for a user
display_delegated: Revoke all sign in sessions for a user
description_application: Allow the app to revoke all sign in sessions for a user, without a signed-in user.
description_delegated: Allow the app to revoke all sign in sessions for a user, on behalf of a signed-in user.

display_delegated: Read and write app activity to users' activity feed
description_delegated: Allows the app to read and report the signed-in user's activity in the app.

display_delegated: Read user authentication methods.
description_delegated: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like the signed-in user's passwords, or to sign-in  or otherwise use the signed-in user's authentication methods.

display_application: Read all users' authentication methods
display_delegated: Read all users' authentication methods
description_application: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.
description_delegated: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to. Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

display_delegated: Read and write user authentication methods
description_delegated: Allows the app to read and write the signed-in user's authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings.                       This does not allow the app to see secret information like the signed-in user's passwords, or                      to sign-in or otherwise use the signed-in user's authentication methods.

display_application: Read and write all users' authentication methods
display_delegated: Read and write all users' authentication methods.
description_application: Allows the application to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user.                       Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This                      does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods
description_delegated: Allows the app to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to.                       Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This                      does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

display_application: Read all users' passkey authentication methods
display_delegated: Read all users' passkey authentication methods
description_application: Allows the app to read passkey authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.
description_delegated: Allows the app to read passkey authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

display_application: Read and write all users' passkey authentication methods
display_delegated: Read and write all users' passkey methods.
description_application: Allows the application to read and write passkey authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods
description_delegated: Allows the app to read and write passkey authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

display_delegated: Read cloud clipboard items
description_delegated: Allows the app to read cloud clipboard data on behalf of the signed-in user.

display_application: Deliver and manage all user's notifications
display_delegated: Deliver and manage user's notifications
description_application: Allows the app to send, read, update and delete user's notifications, without a signed-in user.
description_delegated: Allows the app to send, read, update and delete user's notifications.

display_application: Read all user shift preferences
description_application: Allows the app to read all users' shift schedule preferences without a signed-in user.

display_application: Read and write all user shift preferences
description_application: Allows the app to manage all users' shift schedule preferences without a signed-in user.

display_delegated: Read user teamwork settings
description_delegated: Allows the app to read the teamwork settings of the signed-in user.

display_application: Read all user teamwork settings
description_application: Allows the app to read all user teamwork settings without a signed-in user.

display_delegated: Write app activity to users' timeline
description_delegated: Allows the app to report the signed-in user's app activity information to Microsoft Timeline.

display_delegated: Read windows settings for all devices
description_delegated: Allows the app to read a user's windows settings which are stored in cloud and their values on behalf of the signed-in user.

display_delegated: Read and write windows settings for all devices
description_delegated: Allows the app to read and write a user's windows settings which are stored in cloud and their values on behalf of the signed-in user.

display_application: Read Verified Id profiles
display_delegated: Read Verified Id profiles
description_application: This role can read Verified Id profiles in a tenant.
description_delegated: This role can read Verified Id profiles in a tenant.

display_delegated: Read and write Verified Id profiles
description_delegated: This role can read and write Verified Id profiles in a tenant.

display_delegated: Read a user's virtual appointments
description_delegated: Allows an application to read virtual appointments for the signed-in user. Only an organizer or participant user can read their virtual appointments.

display_application: Read all virtual appointments for users, as authorized by online meetings application access policy
description_application: Allows the application to read virtual appointments for all users, without a signed-in user. The app must also be authorized to access an individual user's data by the online meetings application access policy.

display_delegated: Read and write a user's virtual appointments
description_delegated: Allows an application to read and write virtual appointments for the signed-in user. Only an organizer or participant user can read and write their virtual appointments.

display_application: Read-write all virtual appointments for users, as authorized by online meetings app access policy
description_application: Allows the application to read and write virtual appointments for all users, without a signed-in user. The app must also be authorized to access an individual user's data by the online meetings application access policy.

display_application: Send notification regarding virtual appointments as any user
display_delegated: Send notification regarding virtual appointments for the signed-in user
description_application: Allows the application to send notification regarding virtual appointments as any user, without a signed-in user. The app must also be authorized to access an individual user's data by the online meetings application access policy.
description_delegated: Allows an application to send notifications for virtual appointments for the signed-in user.

display_delegated: Read your virtual events
description_delegated: Allows the app to read virtual events created by you

display_application: Read all users' virtual events
description_application: Allows the app to read all virtual events without a signed-in user.

display_delegated: Read and write your virtual events
description_delegated: Allows the app to read and write virtual events for you

display_application: Read and write anonymous users' virtual event registrations
description_application: Allows the app to read and write anonymous users' virtual event registrations, without a signed-in user

display_application: Read and write all Windows update deployment settings
display_delegated: Read and write all Windows update deployment settings
description_application: Allows the app to read and write all Windows update deployment settings for the organization without a signed-in user.
description_delegated: Allows the app to read and write all Windows update deployment settings for the organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

display_application: Read workforce integrations
display_delegated: Read workforce integrations
description_application: Allows the app to read workforce integrations without a signed-in user.
description_delegated: Allows the app to read workforce integrations, to synchronize data from Microsoft Teams Shifts, on behalf of the signed-in user.

display_application: Read and write workforce integrations
display_delegated: Read and write workforce integrations
description_application: Allows the app to manage workforce integrations to synchronize data from Microsoft Teams Shifts, without a signed-in user.
description_delegated: Allows the app to manage workforce integrations, to synchronize data from Microsoft Teams Shifts, on behalf of the signed-in user.
